alert.note: Alert for Churchill; Pershing (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:55PM PDT until June 06 at 3:15PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM PDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHURCHILL AND SOUTH CENTRAL PERSHING COUNTIES... At 253 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Lovelock, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. Less than a mile visibility from blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, fencing and trees. Blowing dust will lead to a sudden reduction in visibility along I-80. Locations impacted include... I-80, Lovelock and Lovelock Derby Field Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. DUST STORMS ARE DEADLY. Less than 1 mile visibility. Delay travel if at all possible.
